article_title: Ukraine Is A Valuable Lesson In The Tradeoff Between Freedom And Freebies

article_metadata.description: When you accept handouts, you lose some freedom as the freebies almost always come with strings attached. Looking past the short-term gain to the long-term costs is essential if we are to retain our liberty.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
